| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line313](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line313 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **burbling blob**, b, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is a [blob](/wiki/Blob "Blob") that is a stronger variant of the [jiggling blob](/wiki/Jiggling_blob "Jiggling blob").

A burbling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance") and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

A burbling blob [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") has a 93% chance of conveying poison resistance.

## Generation

Randomly generated burbling blobs are always generated hostile. Burbling blobs will not randomly generate in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for amoeboid](/wiki/Amoeboid#Encyclopedia_entry "Amoeboid").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Burbling_blob\&action=edit)*

html:
Burbling blob

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
b burbling blob
Difficulty 15
Attacks Touch 2d8, Passive 5d4 acid
b burbling blob
Difficulty 15
Attacks

Touch 2d8, Passive 5d4 acid

Base level 14
Base experience 348
Speed 6
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 200
Nutritional value 100
Size Large
Resistances sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed poison (93%)

A burbling blob:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line313

A burbling blob, b, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is a blob that is a stronger variant of the jiggling blob.

A burbling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses sleep resistance and poison resistance.

A burbling blob corpse is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or tin has a 93% chance of conveying poison resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated burbling blobs are always generated hostile. Burbling blobs will not randomly generate in Gehennom.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for amoeboid.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''burbling blob''', {{monsym|burbling blob}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is a [[blob]] that is a stronger variant of the [[jiggling blob]].

A burbling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses [[sleep resistance]] and [[poison resistance]].

A burbling blob [[corpse]] is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or [[tin]] has a 93% chance of conveying poison resistance.

==Generation==
Randomly generated burbling blobs are always generated hostile. Burbling blobs will not randomly generate in [[Gehennom]].
